Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Directs the division of housing and community renewal to conduct a study on alternatives to the affordable New York housing program
Summary: Directs the division of housing and community renewal to conduct a study on alternatives to the affordable New York housing program by investigating new models and partnerships to provide affordable housing to residents of the state.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the division of housing and community renewal to conduct a study on alternatives to the affordable New York housing program
